description:
This desktop picture changes throughout the day, based on your location.
Inspired by, and based on, macOS Catalina 1.0.6 by LucKY: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1886569071
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Includes macOS 11 Big Sur's Wallpapers, changing based on the time of day (dynamic mode) or manually selected within Wallpaper Engine's UI (static mode).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
- Internet-based location detection might not be functional under some network conditions and in some regions
- To make your own dynamic wallpaper, visit GitHub page for codes: https://github.com/Yaindrop/DynamicWallpaper
- Original from Yaindrop and LucKY
title: macOS Big Sur Dynamic
